= MIPv6-NEMO =
mysip-mr.tcl 3 1

----

Global 

Agent/MIHUser/IFMNGMT/MIPV6 set exp`_` 0	;(1,1,1), (1,1,n), (1,n,1)

Agent/MIHUser/IFMNGMT/MIPV6 set exp`_` 4	;(1,n,n)

CN
 # create node by addr
 # set link
 # install-default-ifmanager (mipv6)
 # mipv6 set-node-type CN
 # ~~create udp_ agent~~
 # ~~create cbr_ agent~~
 # ~~cbr_ attach-agent udp_~~
 # create udpmysipagent udp_s
 # attach udp_s on port 3
 # udp_s set-mipv6 
 # create mysipapp agent mysipapp_s
 # mysipapp_s attach-agent udp_s
 # mysipapp_s  set pktsize_, random_, myID_URL
 # at time "mysipapp_s send_invite URL IP"

 # set link
 # install-default-ifmanager (mipv6)
 # mipv6 set-node-type MN_HA
 # create udpmysipagent udp_server
 # attach udp_server on port 3
 # create mysipapp agent mysipapp_server
 # mysipapp_server attach-agent udp_server

MR_HA

= SIP-NEMO =
mysip-mr3.tcl 3 1

----

Global 

Agent/MIHUser/IFMNGMT/MIPv6/Handover/Handover1 set confidence_th`_` 100	; disable 802_21

CN
 # create node by addr
 # set link
 # install-default-ifmanager (mipv6)
 # mipv6 set-node-type CN
 # ~~create udp_ agent~~
 # ~~create cbr_ agent~~
 # ~~cbr_ attach-agent udp_~~
 # create udpmysipagent udp_s
 # *udp_s set-node-type SIP_CN*
 # attach udp_s on port 3
 # ~~udp_s set-mipv6 ~~
 # *mipv6 set-udpmysip udp_s*
 # create mysipapp agent mysipapp_s
 # mysipapp_s attach-agent udp_s
 # mysipapp_s  set pktsize_, random_, myID_URL
 # at time "mysipapp_s send_invite URL IP"

MN_HA

 # set link
 # install-default-ifmanager (mipv6)
 # mipv6 set-node-type MN_HA

 # attach udp_server on port 3
 # create mysipapp agent mysipapp_server
 # mysipapp_server attach-agent udp_server
 # mysipapp_server set myID_URL, add_URL_record

MR_HA
